name: Onion
condition: Colored brown/black spots, soft spots, mold

name: Green Bean
condition: Limp and dry, flexible rather than snappy

name: Carrot
condition: Dark spots and small white spots, mushy

name: Chicken
condition: Slimey, bad odor, gray and yellow spots, below 165 degrees farenheit

name: Pork
condition: Below 165 degrees (145 in certain cases), sour odor, dry, sticky, or excessively moist

name: Garlic
condition: Brown spots on cloves, yellow tan

name: Eggplant
condition: Wrinkly or withered skin, notably soft/squishy, turning excessively brown

name: Cucumber
condition: Slimy and soft rather than firm at the surface

name: Apples
condition: Soft spots and bruising, mushy, bland, grainy taste

name: Broccoli
condition: Limp, florets turn yellow, intense smell

name: Eggs
condition: Floats when placed in a bowl of water (Air started to form in the egg)

name: Parsley
condition: Soft and discolored, off smell and appearance

name: Lemon
condition: Soft texture, discoloration, moist and developing mold

name: Parmesan
condition: Smells off, color is yellow or dark beige, texture change (spongy, not firm)

name: Asparagus
condition: Tips become dark green or black, texture is mushy, smells off

name: Shrimp
condition: Sour smell, dull color, overly slimey, off smell and appearance

name: Bread
condition: Visible mold, smell or taste gross, stale (undesirable texture)
